item.description:
Let's trick or treat together!

Visit the Atrium Mall in Chestnut Hill for their annual mall-wide Trick-or-Treating event instead of being stuck out in the cold weather this Halloween. Why not Trick or Treat inside where it's warm and the atmosphere is safe and festive?

Each participating retailer will place balloons directly outside their store so the kids know where to find the treats. As an added treat this year, Kidgits Club Members can stop by our Simon Marketplace located on Level 1 to receive a special Trick-or-Treat Bag filled with Halloween goodies (while supplies last).

http://www.bostoncent...
item.name: Trick or Treat at the Atrium Mall
